extendedInfo.description: The best app for drummers. Is very easy to study and to play drum now with the loops for drummers sessions. Good for improvisation too for others instruments. Free version !  Diferences and qualities:- you can only hear the drum and also the guitar (Harmony) separate for you to study.- other session - one jazz and one brazil rhythm (mpb), reggae, rock, funk. (other rhythms can be updated)- this is a free version.Comunity - facebook : https://www.facebook.com/androidappsandgamesforyouwords about the app: drum, drummers, snare,  ride , percussion, cymbal , hi-hat , stand, bass, drum , toms, tom , floor , pedal , drummin , machine , music , kit , set , bass , bassist , bassists , tabs , tabla , the , fort , black, jungle , pad , oil , hang , hero , best , musician , guitar , guitarrist , music , track ,  jazz , sax , trumpet , score, berimbau , loop , metal , hard rock , improvisation , tango , headphone , adapter , audio , mix , DJ , dance , hard , rock , metal , punk , garage, band , bongos, Bossa Nova, Accents, Afro Cuban , American Grip, BaiÃ£o, axÃ©, forrÃ³, Bar, Bass comping, Bass drum, Bass drum pedal, Bass pedal spring, Batter head, Beater, BembÃ©, Bossa Nova ClavÃ¨, bpm, Broken Up Beats, Brooms, Brushes, Cascara, Cha Cha , Chimes, China Cymbal , China Kang, ClavÃ¨s, ClavÃ¨ Pattern, Click track, Common Time, Comping, Conga , Cowbell, Crash cymbal, Crescendos, Cross stick, Cymbal ,Cymbal bell, Decrescendos, Djembe, Double bass drum, Double bass pedal, Drag, Drum break, Drum dampeners, Drum fill, Drum head .
